snippet: It might be another decade before social network updates flash to us through wearable screens and contact lenses. Yet wearable computing is already here to help people track some aspects of health, like sleep patterns, and view the results through a...
abstract: It might be another decade before social network updates flash to us through wearable screens and contact lenses. Yet wearable computing is already here to help people track some aspects of health, like sleep patterns, and view the results through a smartphone.

headline.main: Today's Wearable Computers Help You Sleep, Not Tweet
